\chapter{Python Restricted Astronomy and Astrodynamics}
\label{\detokenize{index:python-restricted-astronomy-and-astrodynamics}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Package for dynamical systems analysis of restricted three\sphinxhyphen{}body models

\begin{sphinxadmonition}{important}{Important:}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Core Functionality}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Circular and Elliptical Restricted Three\sphinxhyphen{}body Dynamical Models

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Variable precision Runge\sphinxhyphen{}Kutta numerical integration

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Flexible and advanced plotting capabilities

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Differential corrections targeting algorithms

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Numerical Continuation schemes

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Poincar√© Map generation

\end{itemize}

\end{description}
\end{sphinxadmonition}

\begin{sphinxadmonition}{note}{Note:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Does not support N\sphinxhyphen{}body integration

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Does not support 2\sphinxhyphen{}body orbital dynamics

\end{itemize}
\end{sphinxadmonition}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Author}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Drew Langford

\sphinxlineitem{Email}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxhref{mailto:langfora@purdue.edu}{langfora@purdue.edu}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\index{er3bp\_JC() (in module pyraa.models)@\spxentry{er3bp\_JC()}\spxextra{in module pyraa.models}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{models:pyraa.models.er3bp_JC}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{pyraa.models.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{er3bp\_JC}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{tau}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{  }\DUrole{n}{float}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{s}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{  }\DUrole{n}{list}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{mu}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{  }\DUrole{n}{float}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{e}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{  }\DUrole{n}{float}}}{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
er3bp\_JC \sphinxhyphen{} calculate Jacobi constant in er3bp model

\sphinxAtStartPar
The Jacobi constant is an integral of motion in the cr3bp.
The er3bp does not possess a constant of integration from the
equations of motion. Nonetheless, it can be informative to compute
a particles JC over a trajectory

\sphinxAtStartPar
Source: Hiday 1992 Purdue Univerity Dissertation
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Parameters}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{tau}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \sphinxhyphen{}\sphinxhyphen{} non\sphinxhyphen{}dim time

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{s}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{1x6 array}}) \sphinxhyphen{}\sphinxhyphen{} state of sc

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{mu}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \sphinxhyphen{}\sphinxhyphen{} mass ratio of system

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Returns}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{JC} \sphinxhyphen{}\sphinxhyphen{} jacobi constant

\sphinxlineitem{Return type}
\sphinxAtStartPar
float

\end{description}\end{quote}
